title: Girl x Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: All-Girls School   Beautiful Female Lead   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First
author: Sasayaka Shī   ささやか椎
description: Yumina, a high school girl who easily liked by same-sex since she was a child, struggles to become a「 Normal Girl Who is not Popular with Girls 」when she entered・・・・・・an All-Girls School loves comedy that unravels the fate of Yumina, a beautiful girl who is not interested in love with the same sex, and the unique girls who surround her.>
